news_header: Rwanda-backed rebels accused of atrocities in eastern Congo.
news_original_title: UN human rights chief accuses Rwanda-backed rebels in east Congo of killing children, attacking hospitals
news_text: The U.N. human rights chief accused Rwanda-backed M23 rebels of killing children and attacking humanitarian aid facilities in eastern Congo, particularly after their capture of Bukavu. The ongoing conflict has displaced millions and led to significant humanitarian crises.
